testCases.query: Show me the current status of the OrchestKit feedback system and what patterns it has learned from my usage.
expectedBehavior: Claude reads the feedback system configuration files
Claude lists learned patterns and agent performance metrics
Claude shows privacy settings and consent status
Claude does NOT modify any settings without explicit request

testCases.query: I want to opt out of anonymous analytics sharing and then export all my feedback data before resetting everything.
expectedBehavior: Claude executes opt-out to disable anonymous analytics sharing
Claude requires explicit RESET confirmation before clearing learned patterns
Claude follows GDPR-compliant consent revocation flow
Claude handles the multi-step sequence in correct order (opt-out, export, then reset)

testCases.query: Refactor the authentication middleware to use JWT tokens instead of session cookies.
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the feedback skill
Claude implements the JWT refactoring using standard code editing tools
Claude does not access feedback configuration or analytics files
